trans-unit.target: get to know new friends in Danderyd

Coming soon! We’re so happy to announce our new project in Danderyd where we’ll be able to match up new friends living or working in Danderyd. We’ll be matching up new and established swedes for a 1 hour meeting where you go for a coffee or a walk in the neighborhood. You will be able to sign up individually to meet a new friend – or as a family with children and get matched up with another family with children.
Leave us your contact information – that way we can contact you as soon the registration opens and you might be one of the first people to get matched up in Danderyd.
*We will save your e-mail only until the registration opens and we have contacted you for this purpose. Your e-mail will not be used in any other way.

1. Registration
    Register by answering a few simple questions about yourself. It is free to sign up. You will receive a confirmation email when we have received your application.
  2. Match
    We will send you an email with the contact details to your new friend.
  3. Confirm the meeting
    You contact your new friend within 3 days to confirm date, time and place for the meeting.
  4. Meeting
    You meet for about 1 hour to go for a walk, have coffee or some other activity within Danderyd.
  5. What happens after the meeting?
    We will contact you after the meeting to ask about your experience. If you both thought it was fun, you are welcome to continue to see each other on your own. You can also sign in and make a new application to meet a new person, or simply be super happy with the meeting you have been to.
Kompisbyrån Danderyd drivs i samarbete med Danderyds kommun och den ideella organisationen "Alla tillsammans i Danderyd".
Vi kontaktar dig när vi öppnar anmälan för Danderyd
